title: House Rejects Aircraft Locator Bill After Last Year's Collision
summary: The ROTOR Act, aimed at preventing midair collisions, failed to pass the House due to insufficient support.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the challenges in implementing safety measures despite past incidents and public concern.

title: ICE Arrests Four Men Ahead of Court Hearings in Mecklenburg County
summary: ICE arrested four men in Mecklenburg County as their attorneys attempted to intervene.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates ongoing tensions between law enforcement and legal representatives regarding immigration enforcement.

title: Huntersville Rezoning Proposal Filed for Townhomes, Grocery Store
summary: WLA Enterprises, Inc. proposes building Knox Crossing with townhomes and a grocery store near Sam Furr Road.

title: Raising Cane's Sets Opening Date for Charlotte-Area Debut in Rock Hill
summary: Raising Cane's will open its first Charlotte-area location in Rock Hill on February 24.

title: Waymo Rumors Fuel Autonomous Vehicle Speculation in Charlotte

title: Charlotte's First Fully-Electric Fire Engine Is Temporarily Out of Service
summary: Charlotte's first electric fire engine is out of service, with a traditional engine replacing it.

title: Man Accused of Beating Woman After Matthews Road Rage Incident
summary: James Washer is charged with assault after a road rage incident in Matthews.

title: East Charlotte Neighbors Unsure About Proposed Data Center
summary: Plans to rezone land for a data center in east Charlotte raise concerns about infrastructure and energy use.

title: Man Killed by Stanly County Deputy in Shooting
summary: The NC SBI is investigating a shooting in which a Stanly County deputy killed a man.

title: Arrest Made After Kings Mountain Police Search Hemp Business
summary: Police searched a hemp business in Kings Mountain following reports of suspicious activity.

title: Adoptive Father Returns to Alexander Youth Network to Help Other Families
summary: Brooks Shelley, who adopted his son through the Alexander Youth Network, now serves as its director of development.

title: Salisbury Parents Arrested for Baby's Fentanyl Exposure

title: Interactive Bank of America Stadium Experience Center Comes to Uptown Charlotte
